name: Guizadas (Nut Cakes)
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, dessert, egg, egg yolks, orange blossom water, pistachio, superfine sugar
recipeIngredient: 2 1/3 cups shelled unsalted pistachios (almonds can be substituted)

recipeInstructions.text: Coarsely grind the pistachios in a food processor. Add the rest of the ingredients and blend quickly and well. The idea is to avoid mincing the nuts: the more texture the better for these sweets.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Drop a heaping tablespoon of the mixture into paper candy cups and bake for 25 minutes, until slightly firm.
